project.name: Prime Minister's Office
project.description: Official app of the Indian Prime Minister's office
project.extra_desc: Built the official app of the Indian Prime Minister's office after winning a large contest in collaboration with Google and Government of India. This app gives citizens access to critical information about flagship programmes. In addition, the app provides an overview of the Prime Ministerâ€™s major initiatives, news and social media updates, all in 10 indian languages.
